com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring
Class MonitoringFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.MonitoringFactory

public class MonitoringFactory
extends HibernateFactory

MonitoringFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.ServerProbe objects from the database.
